page.title: 17AN UNUSUAL CROP
page.content: A unique crop grown in this block, is that of{Chicory.}First grown in 1974, the area now covered by it is some 18 acres, much of which is rented As a rotation system is used, not all the land lies within our block in any one season. { Chicory}is a{salad crop}and is first sown out of doors in the Spring. It is brought indoors in the Autumn and is forced under warm, dark conditions. Harvesting begins in November and continues until April. The entire crop is sold to one of the big supermarket chains (Waitrose) who distibute it round the country. Demand is increasing annually, which is encouraging for the producer as he is the only known grower in the country. At present the crop provides work for six people.
